devdoc.author: The Moonbeam Team
devdoc.details: The interface through which solidity contracts will interact with xtokens pallet

transfer(address,uint256,(uint8,bytes[]).details: The token transfer burns/transfers the corresponding amount before sending

params.amount: The amount of tokens we want to transfer
params.currencyAddress: The ERC20 address of the currency we want to transfer
params.destination: The weight we want to buy in the destination chain

transferMultiAssets(((uint8,bytes[]),uin.details: The token transfer burns/transfers the corresponding amount before sending

params.assets: The assets we want to transfer, defined by their location and amount.
params.destination: The Multilocation to which we want to send the tokens
params.feeItem: Which of the currencies to be used as fee
params.weight: The weight we want to buy in the destination chain

transferMultiCurrencies((address,uint256.details: The token transfer burns/transfers the corresponding amount before sending

params.currencies: The currencies we want to transfer, defined by their address and amount.
params.destination: The Multilocation to which we want to send the tokens
params.feeItem: Which of the currencies to be used as fee
params.weight: The weight we want to buy in the destination chain

transferMultiasset((uint8,bytes[]),uint2.details: The token transfer burns/transfers the corresponding amount before sending

params.amount: The amount of tokens we want to transfer
params.asset: The asset we want to transfer, defined by its multilocation. Currently only Concrete Fungible assets
params.destination: The weight we want to buy in the destination chain

transferMultiassetWithFee((uint8,bytes[].details: The token transfer burns/transfers the corresponding amount before sending

params.amount: The amount of tokens we want to transfer
params.asset: The asset we want to transfer, defined by its multilocation. Currently only Concrete Fungible assets
params.destination: The weight we want to buy in the destination chain

transferWithFee(address,uint256,uint256,.details: The token transfer burns/transfers the corresponding amount before sending

params.amount: The amount of tokens we want to transfer
params.currencyAddress: The ERC20 address of the currency we want to transfer
params.destination: The weight we want to buy in the destination chain

devdoc.title: Xtokens Interface

transfer(address,uint256,(uint8,bytes[]).notice: Transfer a token through XCM based on its currencyId

transferMultiAssets(((uint8,bytes[]),uin.notice: Transfer several tokens at once through XCM based on its location specifying fee

transferMultiCurrencies((address,uint256.notice: Transfer several tokens at once through XCM based on its address specifying fee

transferMultiasset((uint8,bytes[]),uint2.notice: Transfer a token through XCM based on its MultiLocation

transferMultiassetWithFee((uint8,bytes[].notice: Transfer a token through XCM based on its MultiLocation specifying fee

transferWithFee(address,uint256,uint256,.notice: Transfer a token through XCM based on its currencyId specifying fee
